snippet.title: ISLANDERS: Console Edition | Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
ISLANDERS: Console Edition is available now on Nintendo Switch, with PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X | S following on August 26th. Xbox Series X & PlayStation 5 are available via backwards compatibility.

ISLANDERS: Console Edition is a relaxing minimalist strategy game about building cities on colourful islands. With simple and intuitive building mechanics, you have the freedom to create your own cities on the rugged cliffs of the game’s islands in half an hour or less.

Explore these procedurally generated Islands from lush green grasslands to dry deserts and snowy mountainscapes, expanding your settlements from sprawling villages to vast cities.

Learn more about ISLANDERS: Console Edition at http://islandersconsole.com

Join the community and share your island @ https://discord.gg/coatsink

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
